Spears::
She followed him, tears still running down her cheeks. She muttered 
as she walked, still dazed. Mutters,"just kill me and getit over 
with..with out Striker, it's not worth it."
She whispered Striker's name over and over. Her spark not wanting to 
believe he was gone.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm's eyes widen. He couldn't believe what she had just asked 
> him! He catches up to her, putting a hand on her shoulder.
> 
> "Look, even if we don't get Striker back, there are many other 
things 
> to live for in the world, you shouldn't give up. But we'll get 
> Striker back, don't worry."
> 
> He walks out of the room, "Now follow me, I'll show you to some 
> quarters."
>
